void.string: Benefit: In addition to the standard single extra attack the character gets with an off-hand weapon, the character gets a second attack with the off-hand weapon, albeit at a -5 penalty. Normal: Without this feat, the character can only get a single extra attack with an off-hand weapon. Special: A ranger who meets only the base attack bonus prerequisite can gain this feat, but can only use it when wearing light armor or no armor.
Two-Weapon Fighting, Ambidexterity, base attack bonus +9 or higher.
